title: New: Sunboy – Aphrodisia
content: Seemingly appearing out of nowhere, Colorado duo Sunboy managed to make themselves one of the most exciting new acts of the year when they dropped their debut track, Anxious People. Their new cut, Aphrodisia, is less psychedelic and more out-and-out chilled indie pop, is destined to find it’s way onto all the hottest blogs. A tinkling piano, female backing vocals and an overwhelming sense of nostalgia, Sunboy are one of my favourite new acts right now.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
